summary: Api is provided for finance and seller to query logistics fee details from slb
description: Api is provided for finance and seller to query logistics fee details from slb.

query.name: seller_id
query.description: identity of seller which should not be blank

query.name: request_type
query.description: type of request which is used to distinguish different systems(e.g. OPEN_API)

query.name: biz_flow_type
query.description: corresponding settlement scenario of request(e.g. LAZADA, LAZADA_3PV, default biz flow type is LAZADA)

query.name: bill_start_time
query.description: timestamp of the time that bill started

query.name: bill_end_time
query.description: timestamp of the time that bill ended

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/lbs/slb/queryLogisticsFeeDetail')
request.add_api_parameter("seller_id", "1002")
request.add_api_parameter("request_type", "OPEN_API")
request.add_api_parameter("trade_order_id", "9432987348")
request.add_api_parameter("trade_order_line_id", "9432997348")
request.add_api_parameter("fee_type", "COD")
request.add_api_parameter("biz_flow_type", "LAZADA")
request.add_api_parameter("bill_start_time", "1642003200000")
request.add_api_parameter("bill_end_time", "1642003200000")
request.add_api_parameter("page_no", "1")
request.add_api_parameter("page_size", "10")
request.add_api_parameter("total_records", "1000")
response = client.execute(request, accessToken)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/lbs/slb/queryLogisticsFeeDetail')
request.add_api_param('seller_id', '1002')
request.add_api_param('request_type', 'OPEN_API')
request.add_api_param('trade_order_id', '9432987348')
request.add_api_param('trade_order_line_id', '9432997348')
request.add_api_param('fee_type', 'COD')
request.add_api_param('biz_flow_type', 'LAZADA')
request.add_api_param('bill_start_time', '1642003200000')
request.add_api_param('bill_end_time', '1642003200000')
request.add_api_param('page_no', '1')
request.add_api_param('page_size', '10')
request.add_api_param('total_records', '1000')
response = client.execute(request, access_token)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)
